QuestData.Title: Honor and Strength
QuestData.Description: My name is Vex'tul, and I have watched you fight, $r. You are strong.$b$bYou killed my master, Zaeldarr, but this does not bother me. I value strength over any loyalty that I held for him. I value strength over anything else.$b$bProve to me one final time your strength, $r. Do so, and I will lend you MY strength for whatever purpose you may desire.
QuestData.RewardText: Yes, you are indeed strong... and I submit to you.$b$bI will join you and your friend, the worgen. My strength is yours.
